p: Before optimization of multiplex LAMP assay, each Influenza A, B and internal control (IC, actin beta) LAMP primer set were tested with clinical samples (Influenza A H1, H1N1, H3N2, Influenza B, human serum RNA and distilled water). All three LAMP primer sets (Influenza A, B and IC) showed the no cross-reactivity ( S1 Fig).
